hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombchus (5 pieces)# and #a Red Potion Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #5# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest
